result:
#notification-button
  position: relative

  #unread
    position: absolute
    top: 0.25rem
    right: 0.3rem
    background-color: cornflowerblue
    width: 1.25rem
    height: 1.25rem
    display: flex
    border-radius: 50%
    border: 2px solid white
    span
      margin: auto
      color: white
      font-size: 0.9rem
  
#context
  display: none
  right: 0
  top: 100%
  cursor: default
  min-width: 17rem
#notification-button:focus #context, #context:focus, #context:hover
  display: flex
  position: absolute

sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
div(v-if='$store.getters.isAuthenticated')
  a#notification-button.padding(tabindex=1)
    fa(icon="bell")
    div#unread: span 5
    div#context.card.flex.column(tabindex=1)
      ul.links.remove-list-style.show-large.flex.column
        each val, index in {'Title':'body','Subject':'body'}
          li: a.padding.wide.inline-block(@click=`EventBus.$emit("show", {modal: 'notification-modal',params: {title:'World',body:'earth'}})`)
            strong=index
            br
            small=val
          hr
  //- @click=`EventBus.$emit("show", {modal: 'notification-modal',params: {title:'World',body:'earth'}})`
  //- modal(:visible="false" alias="notification-modal")
  //-   template(scope="props")
  //-     span Hello {{props.params}}
</template>

<script>
import { EventBus } from '@/eventbus.js';
import Modal from '@/components/reusable/modal.vue'

export default {
  components: {
    'modal': Modal,
  },
  data () {
    return {
      EventBus
    }
  }
}
</script>


<style lang="sass" scoped>
#notification-button
  position: relative

  #unread
    position: absolute
    top: 0.25rem
    right: 0.3rem
    background-color: cornflowerblue
    width: 1.25rem
    height: 1.25rem
    display: flex
    border-radius: 50%
    border: 2px solid white
    span
      margin: auto
      color: white
      font-size: 0.9rem
  
#context
  display: none
  right: 0
  top: 100%
  cursor: default
  min-width: 17rem
#notification-button:focus #context, #context:focus, #context:hover
  display: flex
  position: absolute
</style>
